PHRASE.LANG: Digitally speaking, I think you've really taken us back to the cartridge days. [#Legal]
Technologiquement parlant, on nage en pleine ère de la cartouche. [#Legal]
Digital gesagt: Ich glaube, wir sind im Steckmodul-Zeitalter gelandet. [#Legal]
Nell'era digitale, ci riporta ai tempi delle cartucce. [#Legal]
Desde el punto de vista digital, creo que te has remontado a los días de los cartuchos. [#Legal]
Digitally speaking, I think you've really taken us back to the cartridge days. [#Legal]
